Actually I asked the same about one week ago, and some member

ered quite
quickly and nicely.

I copy/paste :

"Saiga, or Saigo, Magoichi =
was a real person from the Sengoku era.

d I do not remember where I read it 
although
it
was online, he was a capta=
in, or leader in some way, of a gun

the
Kii area, and may have=

there.
Additionally, althou=
gh it doesn't really matter or apply: He made an
appearance

supporting
role, where he =
is referred to as "captain of the Kiishi Saiga Gun

Hope
this helps =
a little.  :-)  Take care.  :-)"

refered as gunnery expert for hideyoshi w=
